# Pull Request Template

## Description
One or two sentences summarizing the change.

## Related Issue
Fixes/Closes: #\<issue-number\> (if applicable)

## What I changed
- Brief list of main changes (files / behavior)

## Screenshots / Recording
Attach UI screenshots or a short recording if applicable.

## Checklist
- [ ] I ran the app and verified the change on emulator/device
- [ ] I ran unit tests and lint
- [ ] I updated relevant documentation (README or in-code comments)
- [ ] No unrelated files included in this PR
